Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Mastercard "MauCD CR"
Reviews.Content: It is as we expected. I need a machine with the potential to carry out my work in programming applications where heavy use and this laptop does what I need.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer, poor OS
Reviews.Author: Joseph S Swinglish
Reviews.Content: It's a great computer. The only drawback is Windows 8. Fortunately I found a small add-on program that restores the Windows 7 desktop.

Reviews.Title: Different serial number?
Reviews.Author: Angel D. Discua
Reviews.Content: everything works great but its not the model that it says and for all that looks to be the only problem.

Reviews.Title: NIce laptop
Reviews.Author: greg peterson
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this laptop due to research I had done on several models by several manufacturers and the fact that my HP Pavilion died on me as they have on many others apparently, so I stayed away from HP. I was disappointed on the misleading hard drive capacity specs, as it doesn't have quite that much free space apparently due to "formatting" but overall am quite happy with product. I did opt to max out the RAM and it is quite easy to do on this model.

Reviews.Title: Love this laptop!
Reviews.Author: Greg Daniels
Reviews.Content: Been using this as a mobile editing box. The quad core is really the deal maker on this. Pick up the caddy for a secondary HD and pickup an SSD addon because, as with most mobile DVD drives, the DVD drive is pretty useless and slow. Other than that, all features a great!

Reviews.Title: Meets my needs
Reviews.Author: nbt-jo
Reviews.Content: This computer just works.  I am not a demanding but this computer has all that I need.1. Enough memory for Windows8 to operate smoothly.2. Large HD to store all my data locally.3. Fast CPU that will work in the future.4. The LCD resolution could be better.  But that is not a show stopper.5. The mouse pad is the low point of this machine so get a mouse.

Reviews.Title: a challenge has been issued
Reviews.Author: James Blumer
Reviews.Content: I love the laptop.  As soon as I figure out how to work with Windows 8, I'll love the program.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: christopher duncan
Reviews.Content: Very nice looking laptop.The only reason why I gave it a 4 was because of the battery life and Windows 8The battery life isnt too bad, but I expected a lot better coming from a new laptop.Windows 8 in my experience (2 months) hasnt been funI will try my hardest to get used to it, but for now, it sucks.Great laptop though.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: So far, this laptop has been great. I just moved from a 13.3" screen, so this laptop seems gigantic to me and it's taking some getting used to, but for the price I got it (lightning deal), it was really an amazing deal, and the performance is great.  I use this for watching streaming media online, using Office applications like spreadsheets or presentations, or surfing the web. It does all of that with ease, quickly, and isn't too hot nor too loud. I sometimes even use it to log on to WoW (world of warcraft game) just to do some basic things, and it does pretty well with that as well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: Maria-Lourdes
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my new laptop toshiba. It has all that I ever like. The processor's speed is excellent
